short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep tracking your mood and see you progress!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep tracking your mood and see your progress!

With this extension you can:

- Record you emotions in time at any time
- Put a comment to your emotion if you feel like that
- See the history and notice any kind of progress
